cgraph¶

Module for storing concept graphs @author Siddharth Reddy <sgr45@cornell.edu> 07/21/15

class cgraph.ConceptGraph(concepts_of_module, prereqs_of_concept)¶

Class for storing a content-to-concept graph with an accompanying dependency graph for concepts

concept_module_edges(iter_modules, idx_of_module_id)¶

Get a list of concept-module edges in the graph

Parameters:
  • iter_modules (function) – InteractionHistory.iter_assessments or InteractionHistory.iter_lessons
  • idx_of_module_id (function) – InteractionHistory.idx_of_assessment_id or InteractionHistory.idx_of_lesson_id
Return type:

(np.array, np.array, int, int, np.array)
Returns:

A tuple of (module indexes, concept indexes, number of unique modules, number of unique concepts, number of concepts for each module in the first array of this tuple)
concept_prereq_edges()¶

Get a list of concept-concept prereq edges in the graph

Return type:(np.array, np.array, int)
Returns:A tuple of (prereq_concept_idxes, postreq_concept_idxes, num_concepts)
